global.gap_description: The learner may not know the importance of adding lemon zest and milk to the muffin batter.
global.explanation: The unseen narration explains that grated lemon zest and a milk of choice (soy milk in this case) are added to a large mixing bowl, which can enhance the flavor and texture of the muffins.
global.label: Procedure

global.gap_description: The learner may not be aware of the step to toss blueberries with cornstarch before adding them to the batter.
global.explanation: The unseen narration describes rinsing the blueberries, shaking the water off, and then tossing them with cornstarch to prevent them from sinking in the batter.
global.label: Procedure

global.gap_description: The learner may not know the benefit of refrigerating the batter before baking.
global.explanation: The unseen narration mentions refrigerating the batter for at least one hour to help the muffins rise without overflowing.
global.label: Procedure

global.gap_title: Using a Scale for Dry Ingredients
global.gap_description: The learner may not understand the importance of using a scale for measuring dry ingredients.
global.explanation: The unseen narration emphasizes using a scale for accurate measurement of dry ingredients, which is crucial for successful baking.
global.label: Procedure

global.gap_description: The learner may not know the technique of beating eggs to achieve fluffy muffins.
global.explanation: The unseen narration explains that beating eggs on high speed until they become fluffy and pale is key to making fluffy muffins.
global.label: Procedure

global.gap_description: The learner may not be aware of a master muffin recipe that can be adapted to various flavors.
global.explanation: The unseen narration introduces a master muffin recipe that can be used to make almost any flavor of muffins, providing a versatile base for different variations.
global.label: Procedure

local.gap_description: The learner has not been introduced to the specific context of blueberry muffins, including their appearance and basic description.
local.explanation: The unseen narration in video B-XGIGS4Ipw provides a basic introduction to blueberry muffins by showing and describing them as 'These are my blueberry muffins.' This helps set the context for what the learner will be making.
local.label: Step Introduction

local.gap_description: The learner has not been exposed to the personal achievement and satisfaction aspect of baking muffins.
local.explanation: The unseen narration in video fWp5z_YM07Q highlights the personal achievement of successfully learning how to make muffins and the motivation to create a new version, which can inspire and motivate the learner.
local.label: Step Introduction

local.gap_description: The learner has not been introduced to the chef who will be guiding them through the muffin-making process.
local.explanation: The unseen narration in video gN-orgrgvU8 introduces the chef, Dina from simplyhomecooked.com, and sets the stage for the tutorial by mentioning the specific type of muffins (fluffy and moist blueberry muffins) that will be made.
local.label: Step Introduction

local.gap_description: The learner has not been introduced to the concept of a 'master muffin recipe' which can be a foundational recipe for various types of muffins.
local.explanation: The unseen narration in video cZ2KJPGVwNU introduces the concept of a 'master muffin recipe,' which is a versatile and foundational recipe that can be adapted for different types of muffins.
local.label: Step Introduction
